pages.text: geudaedeul-eun hananim-ui gil-eseo mogsum-eul ilh-eun jadeul-eul dugoseo ‘jug-eun jadeul’ ila malhaji malla. sillo (geudeul-eun) sal-aissneun jadeul-ina geudaedeul-i neukkiji moshal ppun-ila

jinsillo naneun eolmagan-ui dulyeoumgwa baegopeum, jaesangwa saengmyeong-gwa yeolmaeui gamso deung-eulo geudaedeul-eul siheomhal geos-ila. geuligo geudaeneun innaehaneun jadeul-ege gippeun sosig-eul jeonhala
geudeul-ege silyeon-i dagchyeoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun ileohge malhadeola : “sillo ulineun hananim-ui geos-imyeo sillo ulineun geubunkkelo dol-agage doel geos-ibnida.”
geuleohan jadeul-egeneun sillo geudeul junim-eulobuteoui chugboggwa jabiga iss-eul geos-imyeo geuleohan jadeul-eun sillo indobad-eun jadeul-ila

sillo ‘ssapa’ eondeoggwa ‘maleuwa’ eondeog-eun hananim-ui pyosig jung-ui hanala. geuleoni geu jib(ka-euba)eulo seongjisunlye(hasjeu)leul hageona sosunlye(umeula)leul haneun jaga geu dul saileul doneun geos-eun geuege joega doeji anhnola. jabaljeog-eulo seonhaeng-eul silcheonhaneun jaga issdamyeon sillo hananimkkeseoneun gajang pungseonghi bodabhasigo modeun geos-eul algo gyesineun bun-ila

naneun myeongbaeghan jeung-geowa indoleul naelyeossgo salamdeul-eul wihae geugeos-eul seongseoeseo bunmyeonghi seolmyeonghaess-eum-edo sillo geugeos-eul gamchuneun jadeul-i iss-euni, geuleohan jadeul-eun hananimkkeseo geudeul-eul jeojuhasimyeo jeojuhaneun jadeuldo geudeul-eul jeojuhanola

geuleona nwiuchigo haengsil-eul gaeseonhamyeo (sumgyeossdeon geos-eul) bunmyeonghi seolmyeonghaneun jadeul-eun ye-oeloseo, geuleohan jadeul-eun naega geudeul-ui nwiuchim-eul bad-ajul geos-ila. naneun nwiuchineun jaleul bad-ajuneun gajang jaaeloun jala
sillo bulsinhago bulsinjaloseo jug-eum-eul maj-ihaneun ja, geuleohan jadeul-egeneun sillo hananimgwa cheonsadeulgwa salamdeul geu moduui jeojuga iss-eul geos-ila
geudeul-eun geu(jiog) an-eseo meomul geos-imyeo geudeul-e daehan beol-eun gyeong-gamdoeji anh-eul geos-imyeo geudeul-eun yuyeleul badjido moshal geos-ila
geudaedeul-i gyeongbaehaeya hal jonjaeneun ojig hanbun-ila. gajang jabilousigo gajang jaaelousin geubun ioeeneun gyeongbae bad-eul jonjaega eobsnola
